    • isUnderAttack

      public static boolean isUnderAttack(Cell cell)
      Check if a given Cell is a CellUnderAttack.
      パラメータ:
      cell - The given Cell
      戻り値:
      True or False

    • isUnderAttack

      public static boolean isUnderAttack(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Town town)
      Check if a Town has any active flag war cells.
      パラメータ:
      town - Target Town to check.
      戻り値:
      True if there is a CellUnderAttack related to the given Town.

    • isUnderAttack

      public static boolean isUnderAttack(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Nation nation)
      Check if a Nation is under attack by iterating over each of its member Towns.
      パラメータ:
      nation - Target Nation to check.
      戻り値:
      True if there is a CellUnderAttack in any of the supplied Nation's towns.

    • getCellsUnderAttack

      public static List<CellUnderAttack> getCellsUnderAttack()
      Get all cells under attack.
      戻り値:
      A CellUnderAttack list containing all Cells under attack.

    • getCellsUnderAttack

      public static List<CellUnderAttack> getCellsUnderAttack(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Town town)
      Returns a list of cells under attack within a given Town.
      パラメータ:
      town - Target Town to check.
      戻り値:
      All CellUnderAttack objects related to the town.

    • getCellsUnderAttack

      public static List<CellUnderAttack> getCellsUnderAttack(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Retrieves a CellUnderAttack list associated with a Player.
      パラメータ:
      player - The Player object to check against.
      戻り値:
      a CellUnderAttack list tied to a Player.

    • getCellsUnderAttack

      public static List<CellUnderAttack> getCellsUnderAttack(String playerName)
      Retrieves a CellUnderAttack list associated with a player's name.
      パラメータ:
      playerName - The player's name to check against.
      戻り値:
      a CellUnderAttack list tied to a given player name.

    • getNumActiveFlags

      public static int getNumActiveFlags(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Retrieves the number of active flags a Player has in play.
      パラメータ:
      player - A Player
      戻り値:
      The number of flags a Player has in play.

      public static CellUnderAttack getAttackData(Cell cell)
      Gets the CellUnderAttack from a given Cell.
      パラメータ:

      戻り値:
      The extracted CellUnderAttack object.

      パラメータ:

      戻り値:
